chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Lieutenant Tumad Ahzkan, p. 66 (64)—Young lieutenant in Bashere's army, and commander of his personal escort. He can think clearly and see beyond what is in front of him. He is tall, though still two hands shorter than Bael, and has a thick black beard. Bashere is grooming him for a higher rank.
